page.title: 09Apley
page.content: Apley is a mile north of Wellington.The Silkin Way is a {footpath}going all the way through Telford,part of it goes through Apley.A new bridge has been built crossing over the new Whitchurch {road},it makes it a lot easier for ped estrians. In the Apley area,there is a small lake used by local people for fishing.To fish at{Apley pool}you need a licence.For a full membership the fee is Â£10.50.For an associate the fee is Â£9.50,and the fee for a junior member is Â£1.50.Apley pool is behind the Maxell factory and not far from the Shawbirch round-a-bout.
